BOD 580/67
PREFER ONE TRIP TO CHINA.
MV YANGTZE HARMONY
TYPE: SDBC
IMO: 9618355
CLASS: LR
FLAG: MARSHALL ISLANDS
BUILT: 2012 JAN.  ZHEJIANG ZHENGHE SHIPBUILDING CO., LTD
DWAT/DRAFT/TPC: SSW ABT. 56762.8 MT ON 12.80 M/58.8
LOA/BEAM/DEP: 189.99 M / 32.26M/18M
GT/NT:  32987 / 19238
HOLDS/HATCHES: 5 / 5
HATCH COVER : MCGREGOR HYDRAULIC OPERATED DOUBLE SKIN FOLDING TYPE
HATCH DIMENSIONS:
NO.1 : 18.86M X 18.26M
NO. 2+3+4+5 : 21.32M x 18.26M
CARGO CAPACITIES:
GRAIN/M3 : 71634.1
CRANES 4 X 36.0T   ELECTROHYDRAULIC OPERATED CRANES
GRABS FITTED ,4*12CBM
SPEED/CONSUMPTION AS VESSEL TRADING AT OPEN SEA FOR 24 HOURS:
BALLAST: ABT 12.5 KN ON ABT 25 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
LADEN: ABT 12.0 KN ON ABT 26 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
PORT CONSUMPTION:
IDLE:  ABT 3.4MTS VLSFO + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO
WORK:  ABT 4.6MTS VLSFO +ABT 0.1MT LSMGO
"ABT" MEANS AN ALLOWANCE OF +/-0.5KN ON SPEED AND 5PCT ON CONSUMPTION
ALL ABOVE SPEED/CONSUMPTIONS ARE GIVEN FROM BEGINNING TO END OF SEA PASSAGE, AT OPEN SEA, NOT EXCEEDING SUMMER DRAFT, UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITION NAMELY, 24 CONSECUTIVE HOURS (FROM NOON TO NOON), NO ADVERSE CURRENT, NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, BEAUFORT SCALE MAX 4, DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (MEANS SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT LESS THAN 1.25 METRES).
ALWAYS EXCLUDING ANY VOYAGE LESS THAN 48 HOURS TRANSIT TIME FROM SEA PILOT TO SEA PILOT, SAILING IN PIRACY AREAS, IN CONGESTION, IN REDUCED VISIBILITY, MANEUVERING OR SAILING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED WATERS, STRAITS, RIVERS, CANALS, WHEN APPROACHING /ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS AND WHEN LOADED WITH DECK CARGO.
THE VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO BURN EXTRA VLSFO/LSMGO IN CASE OF EMERGENCY, EXCHANGING BALLAST WATER AT SEA, HEATING FUEL IN COLD WEATHER, HOLD CLEANING, MAINTENANCE, MANOEUVRING, SAILING IN SHALLOW/NARROW/CONFINED WATERS, STRAITS, RIVERS, CANAL, ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS, IN HEAVY WEATHER CONDITION AND WHEREVER NECESSARY. COST AND TIME (INCLUDING ANY DEVIATION TIME REQUIRED TO MEET SECA REQUIREMENTS AND/OR REGULATIONS IN OPERATION PORTS TO WHICH VESSEL IS BOUND) INCL BALLAST EXCHANGE TO BE FOR CHARTERERS' ACCOUNT.
CHARTERERS TO SUPPLY BUNKERS WITH SPECIFICATIONS IN ACCORDANCE WITH VLSFO (SULFUR 0.5% MAX)
ISO 8217:2017 RMG380 AND LSMGO(SULFUR 0.1% MAX) ISO 8217:2017 DMA. BIMCO 2020 MARINE FUEL SULPHUR CONTENT CLAUSE FOR TIME CAHRTER PARTIES TO BE INCORPORATED INTO THIS CP.
ADA
PLSD TO HEAR.
